languages.text: "Угомонись, это была проверка на стойкость духа. Есть над чем поработать".

traits.locale_text: "Угомонись, это проверка была на стойкость духа. Есть над чем поработать".

languages.text: "Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."
languages.original_text: "Угомонись, это была проверка на стойкость духа. Есть над чем поработать".

traits.locale_text: "Calm down. That was a fortitude check. Yours could be improved."
"Calm down. That was a fortitude check. Yours could be improved."
"Calm down. That was a fortitude check. Yours could be improved."
"Calm down. That was a fortitude check. Yours could be improved."
"Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."
"Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."

languages.text: “冷静点，我只想看看你的信念够不够坚定。你得更坚定些才行。”
languages.original_text: "Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."

traits.locale_text: “冷静点，我只想看看你的信念够不够坚定。你得更坚定些才行。”

languages.text: 「落ち着け。今のは忍耐力を確かめただけだ。もう少しはマシにできるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着け。今のは忍耐力を確かめただけだ。もう少しはマシにできるはずだ」

languages.text: «Tranquilícese. Era solo una prueba de carácter, que podría ser mejor».
languages.original_text: "Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."

traits.locale_text: «Tranquilícese. Era solo una prueba de su fortaleza, que podría ser mejor».

languages.text: "Beruhigt Euch. Das war nur eine Probe Eurer Zähigkeit. Die Eure ließe sich noch verbessern."
languages.original_text: "Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."

traits.locale_text: "Beruhigt Euch. Das war nur ein Zähigkeitswurf. Die Eure ließe sich noch verbessern."

languages.text: « Calmez-vous. Je mettais simplement votre courage à l'épreuve, et autant vous dire que j'ai connu mieux. »
languages.original_text: "Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."

traits.locale_text: « Calmez-vous. Je mettais simplement votre courage à l'épreuve, et autant vous dire que j'ai connu mieux. »

languages.text: "Sakin ol. Mizacını tartıyordum sadece. Biraz geliştirsen fena olmaz."
languages.original_text: "Calm down. That was a test of your mettle. Yours could be improved."
